short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension granting WebRTC screen capturing capabilities to AirStudy meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is Chrome extension to enable web screen sharing functionality for meetings holds in airstudy.com.au

You will need to install this extension in your chrome browser in order to use the screen share functionality, otherwise you could need to use Firefox browser.
